sentences.en: The younger people might not like the idea.
sentences.cn: 年轻一些的人可能不喜欢这个主意。

sentences.en: I like the older one.This one.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢年纪大点儿的这个。这个。

sentences.en: I：Who is older, your sister or you?
sentences.cn: I：谁年纪较大？ 是你的姐妹还是你？

sentences.en: Like you, a bit, but smarter, taller and better looking.
sentences.cn: 就像你，有一点点，但是更聪明、更高、更好看。

sentences.en: When re-released in January 2010, she will be taller and thinner, but still wearing an outfit similar to her first one.
sentences.cn: 当在2010年1月重新发布的时候，她会变得更高和更瘦，但仍然会穿着和第一次相似的服饰。

sentences.en: The idea is to finish a job in a shorter time as measured by an external clock, even if at the cost of more hardware and programming complexity.
sentences.cn: 其思想是按照外部时钟的步调在更短的时间内完成一项工作，即便要以更复杂的硬件和编程为代价也在所不惜。

sentences.en: The article was abstracted from a longer new book.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章是从一本较长的新书中摘选出来的。

sentences.en: As she looked up to see who I meant — though already knowing, probably, from my tone — suddenly he looked at her, the thinner one, the boyish one, the youngest, perhaps.
sentences.cn: 当她抬头看向我所指的人时——也许从我的声音里就已经听出来了——忽然，他看着她，那个最瘦的，最孩子气的，也许是最年轻的男孩。

sentences.en: Just as in the sun, the chain reaction in the second stage fuses the hydrogen atoms into heavier helium atoms and releases vast amounts of energy in the process.
sentences.cn: 正如在太阳上所进行的反应一样，第二阶段连锁反应将氢原子聚合成较重的氦原子并在这一过程中释放出巨大的能量。

sentences.en: The animal was heavier than Gerard had expected, shifting its weight mysteriously from one corner of the box to another as he carried it out into the snow and set it on the seat beside him.
sentences.cn: 这个动物要比杰拉德想象的要重些，当勃兹曼顶着雪走出来并把它放在杰拉德座位旁边时，箱子里动物的重量神秘的从箱子的一角偏向另一角。

sentences.en: That uncertain thing was swelled bigger.
sentences.cn: 那个不知叫什么的东西膨胀得更大了。

sentences.en: Their ship fell astern of the bigger one.
sentences.cn: 他们的船落到了一条更大的船的后面。

sentences.en: He hypoed his jeep's power by changing a bigger engine.
sentences.cn: 他为他的吉普车换了一个更大的发动机以增大其马力。

sentences.en: Inside the reactor the large molecules are cracked into smaller molecules.
sentences.cn: 在反应堆内部大的分子被裂解为较小的分子。

sentences.en: The competition became so keen that many of smaller companies were frozen out.
sentences.cn: 竞争是如此激烈，许多较小的公司被排挤了出来。

sentences.en: With the changes in the world's climate, dinosaurs died, but many smaller animals lived on. It was the survival of the fittest.
sentences.cn: 随着世界气候的变迁， 恐龙绝迹了， 但许多较小的动物却继续活了下来。 这就是适者生存。

sentences.en: Then you must be stronger than us.
sentences.cn: 那么你一定比我们强壮。

sentences.en: This is certainly not desirable, but if it meant a stronger agreement that addressed the seriousness of the problem, it may not be that bad.
sentences.cn: “这肯定是不可取的，但如果它意味着一份解决了问题严重性的更强有力的协议，那也未必是坏事，”他说。

sentences.en: Thank you for US.I am not afraid to have HIV.I am not afraid to talk about it.YOU make me stronger, we make each other better.
sentences.cn: 感谢美国，我不再害怕身患艾滋，我不在害怕谈论艾滋，是你让我变得强大，是你我们相互鼓舞支持使得彼此的生活更美好。

sentences.en: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.cn: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.en: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.cn: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

sentences.en: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.cn: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.en: a huge tiled entrance hall
sentences.cn: 铺着地砖的大门厅

sentences.en: Let me congratulate you on your winning first place in the 100 metre dash.
sentences.cn: 祝贺你获得百米赛跑第一名。

sentences.en: He came in third in the hundred-meter dash.
sentences.cn: 在百米竞赛中他跑了第三名。

sentences.en: Also, if you recall, we added the row for meter to yard conversion.
sentences.cn: 此外，如果您还记得，我们添加了从米到码的转换行。

phrases.cn: 计数读数；仪表读数，计数器读数

sentences.en: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
sentences.cn: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.en: You need that money more than I do.
sentences.cn: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

sentences.en: There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.cn: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.en: Both Helen’s parents are doctors.
sentences.cn: 海伦的父母都是医生。

sentences.en: Hold it in both hands.
sentences.cn: 用两只手拿好。

sentences.en: You can both swim, can’t you?
sentences.cn: 你们俩都会游泳，对吗？

sentences.en: For example, the kilogram scale allows you to assign a number to an object indicating its weight based upon standardized displacements of measuring instruments.
sentences.cn: 例如，千克尺度允许您给一个物体分配数字，根据测量仪器的标准化的偏移量指示该物体的重量。

sentences.en: The house had lovely views over open countryside .
sentences.cn: 这房子望出去是开阔的乡村美景。

sentences.en: Don't lower yourself, don't be the way they are.
sentences.cn: 不要贬低自己的身份，别像他们那样。

sentences.en: the long dark shadow of an old oak tree
sentences.cn: 一棵老橡树长长的影子

sentences.en: If he is smarter than you ,he is great,but you are fool.
sentences.cn: 如果他比你聪明，他就是有智慧，而你是傻瓜。

sentences.en: So, yes, you might have been really smart in the past, but you could be smarter, I guess, is part of the situation.
sentences.cn: 所以，是的，您也许在过去一直都很聪明，但是您本来还是可以变得更加聪明的，我想这就是一部分情况吧。

sentences.en: In this and all of our efforts, we intend to work smarter, not lower our standards or quality of service.
sentences.cn: 通过我们这些努力，我们想要更聪明地开展工作，而并不降低我们的标准或服务的质量。

sentences.en: The weather became warmer.
sentences.cn: 天气变暖和了。

sentences.en: Slowly my eyes became accustomed to the darkness.
sentences.cn: 我的眼睛渐渐适应了黑暗。

sentences.en: Helen became increasingly anxious about her husband’s strange behaviour.
sentences.cn: 海伦越来越担心她丈夫的反常行为。

phrases.cn: 使遭遇…；…降临于；发生…情况

sentences.en: Mary cooked and cleaned for them.
sentences.cn: 玛丽为他们做饭、打扫卫生。

sentences.en: We did odd jobs like farm work and washing dishes.
sentences.cn: 我们做了一些诸如干农活儿和洗盘子之类的零活儿。

sentences.en: It took a long time to wash the mud out of his hair.
sentences.cn: 花了很长时间才把泥从他头发上洗掉。

phrases.cn: 褪色的，洗旧了的；筋疲力尽的

sentences.en: The man was standing in his doorway watching him.
sentences.cn: 那个男人正站在自家门道里看着他。

sentences.en: He seems to enjoy watching me work.
sentences.cn: 他似乎喜欢看我干活。

sentences.en: Here, now watch how I cut this, OK?
sentences.cn: 嘿，现在看我怎样切，好吗？

trans.tranCn: 得病（例如 had a cold 得了感冒）

sentences.en: He had a cold and spoke with a slight snuffle.
sentences.cn: 他感冒了， 说话有点齉鼻儿。

sentences.en: Since then, he's lost 45 pounds, and he says he hasn't had a cold in seven years.
sentences.cn: 自从那时起，他逐渐减掉了45磅，他还说他在七年里没有得过一次感冒。

sentences.en: My weight came into balance, my skin got better, and my cholesterol dropped. I haven’t had a cold in eight years.
sentences.cn: “我确信纯素食主义者的饮食会使我变得更加的强壮和健康，”《疯狂的性感饮食》的作者克里斯·卡尔说（当他在2003年被诊断为一种罕见的不可治愈的白血病第4期的时候成为了纯素食主义者）“我的体重变得平衡了，我的皮肤变得更好了，我的血脂降下来了，在8年里我没有感冒过。”

sentences.en: I slept during the football game.
sentences.cn: 足球比赛的时候我睡觉。

sentences.en: "I always slept with her backtowards me and myright arm under her neck and my left arm over her, "Thomas said.
sentences.cn: “我睡觉时总是让她背朝着我，她的脖子可以枕在我的右臂上，而我的左臂就抱着她。” 托马斯说。

sentences.en: He slept eight hours.
sentences.cn: 他睡了八个小时。

phrases.cn: 与某人同眠共枕；与某人发生性关系

sentences.en: I can’t read your writing.
sentences.cn: 我看不懂你写的东西。

sentences.en: She picked up the letter and read it.
sentences.cn: 她拿起信读了起来。

sentences.en: Read the instructions carefully before you start.
sentences.cn: 开始前要仔细阅读说明。

sentences.en: He saw you and I.
sentences.cn: 他看见你和我了。

sentences.en: The horrors I saw there ——but I dare not tell them.
sentences.cn: 我在那里看到的恐怖…但我不敢告诉他们。

sentences.en: We held on the sea for about ten days, then we saw an island.
sentences.cn: 我们在海上继续航行了约十天，最后终于看见了一座岛屿。

sentences.en: I hadn’t seen him since the last meeting.
sentences.cn: 自从上次会面后，我再没有见到他。

sentences.en: What did you do yesterday?
sentences.cn: 昨天你做了什么？

sentences.en: Say goodbye before you go.
sentences.cn: 你走之前要告别。

sentences.en: I saw her a few days before she died.
sentences.cn: 她去世的前几天我见过她。

sentences.en: They drank one bottle of wine.
sentences.cn: 他们喝了一瓶葡萄酒。

sentences.en: Between them they drank away every cent.
sentences.cn: 他们俩把身上的钱都喝光了。

sentences.en: He drank so much that nothing he had would stay down.
sentences.cn: 他喝的酒太多了，他会把吃的东西全都呕吐出来。

phrases.cn: n. 喝的东西；一些喝的东西

sentences.en: The man grinned, showing bad teeth.
sentences.cn: 那男人咧着嘴笑，露出一口坏牙。

sentences.en: a magazine article
sentences.cn: 杂志中的文章

sentences.en: She glanced over the magazine racks.
sentences.cn: 她扫了一眼杂志架。

phrases.cn: 商业类杂志；行业性杂志；专业杂志

sentences.en: Your stereo is better than mine.
sentences.cn: 你的音响比我的好。

sentences.en: There must be a better way to do this.
sentences.cn: 一定还有更好的办法来做这件事。

sentences.en: a better-quality car
sentences.cn: 质量更好的汽车

sentences.en: Orders are starting to backlog faster than we can process them.
sentences.cn: 订货单正开始积压得比我们能对它们进行处理更快。(或：订单开始形成积压，我们来不及处理。)

sentences.en: "This is an industry that needs to change faster than it is and it needs outside prodding to do it," he says.
sentences.cn: “这是一个需要比现在变化更快的行业，而要做到这一点，它需要外部的刺激，”他表示。

sentences.en: So we're seeing this push across the industry both in IT and in systems for more responsiveness and faster ability to do integration of software with other parts of what they're doing.
sentences.cn: 因此，我们正在同时从 IT 和系统方面看到这种跨行业的推动力，即实现更高的响应能力和更快地完成软件与它们所做工作的其他部分集成的能力。

sentences.en: I’ve booked the flights and the hotel.
sentences.cn: 我已订好机票和酒店。

sentences.en: We’ll be staying at the Hotel Ibis.
sentences.cn: 我们将住在宜必思酒店。

sentences.en: Mind the broken glass.
sentences.cn: 当心碎玻璃。

sentences.en: Wrap it up well so it doesn’t get broken (=  become broken  ) in the mail.
sentences.cn: 把它包装好，免得在邮寄过程中打碎。

phrases.cn: 解堵；临时出故障；毁坏了的

sentences.en: The light is on.; The lamp is lit up.
sentences.cn: 灯着了。

sentences.en: They blew out the lamp and began to talk.
sentences.cn: 他们吹熄了灯， 就打开了话匣子了。

sentences.en: My lamp uses 60 watts; my toaster uses 600 watts.
sentences.cn: 我的灯用60瓦， 我的烤面包器用600瓦。

phrases.cn: 荧光灯；日光灯；荧光灯管

sentences.en: The book fell to the floor with a loud bang.
sentences.cn: 书砰的一声掉落到地上。

sentences.en: The music was so loud that I had to shout.
sentences.cn: 音乐太响了，我只得大声地喊。

sentences.en: ‘Who’s there?’ asked David in a loud voice.
sentences.cn: “是谁？” 戴维大声问道。

sentences.en: Sandra enjoys her job in the city.
sentences.cn: 桑德拉很喜欢她在城里的这份工作。

sentences.en: I enjoyed every minute of it.
sentences.cn: 我每一分钟都很享受。

sentences.en: How long are they going to stay?
sentences.cn: 他们打算住多久？

phrases.cn: 同…住在一起；把…坚持下去；与…并驾齐驱

sentences.en: We all went except him.
sentences.cn: 除他以外， 我们都去了。

sentences.en: He slipped into his coat and went out.
sentences.cn: 他敏捷地套上外衣，跑到外面去了。

sentences.en: We went in company.
sentences.cn: 我们一起去的。

sentences.en: Let’s go back to camp – it’s getting dark.
sentences.cn: 我们回营地吧，天快黑了。

sentences.en: a camp near Lake Ellen Wilson
sentences.cn: 埃伦•威尔逊湖边的营地

sentences.en: The soldiers broke camp (= took down their tents etc ) and left before dawn.
sentences.cn: 士兵们在黎明前拔营出发了。

sentences.en: On a day of brilliant sunshine,we went camping.
sentences.cn: 在一个阳光明媚的日子，我们去野营。

sentences.en: He went camping with a knife stuck in his belt each time.
sentences.cn: 他每次去露营都佩带腰刀。

sentences.en: Once they went camping with friends who had moved to Alaska.
sentences.cn: 有一次，他们和几个搬到阿拉斯加的朋友去野营。

sentences.en: Over 1,500 different species of fish inhabit the waters around the reef.
sentences.cn: 那片礁石周围的水域生活着1,500多种不同的鱼类。

sentences.en: The stonefish is the most deadly of all fishes.
sentences.cn: 石鱼是所有鱼类中毒性最强的。

sentences.en: The lake is well stocked with fish (= it contains a lot of fish ) .
sentences.cn: 湖中有许多鱼。

sentences.en: Yesterday we went fishing.
sentences.cn: 昨天我们去钓鱼了。

sentences.en: He went fishing.
sentences.cn: 他钓鱼去了。

sentences.en: Mann went fishing, bought sculptures and threw dinner parties for a small set of friends.
sentences.cn: 曼恩会去钓鱼，买一些雕刻品，为数量不多的一伙朋友们办个宴会。

sentences.en: His mother rode him on her back.
sentences.cn: 他的母亲让他骑在她的背上。

sentences.en: He rode his son on his shoulders.
sentences.cn: 他让儿子骑在他的肩上。

sentences.en: They rode over to see us last week.
sentences.cn: 上星期他们骑马来探望我们。

phrases.cn: n. 行驶舒适，（车辆）乘坐平顺性；运行舒适感

sentences.en: Was anyone hurt in the accident?
sentences.cn: 事故中有人受伤吗？

sentences.en: Put that thing down - you might hurt someone with it.
sentences.cn: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

sentences.en: The boy ate several dishfuls of ice cream.
sentences.cn: 那小男孩吃了好几满盘冰淇淋。

sentences.en: They cut the cake in two and ate half each.
sentences.cn: 他们把蛋糕分成两块，每人吃半块。

sentences.en: He nibbled away the apple peel, then ate the flesh.
sentences.cn: 他先慢慢地咬去苹果皮，然后再吃果肉。

phrases.cn: 健康首选；吃得营养；吃的好；胃口好
拿起；吸纳；接受（take up的过去式）

sentences.en: In Chicago I took pictures of landmarks like the Water Tower and Lake Shore Drive, and after we got home I developed them in my darkroom (photography was another of my hobbies).
sentences.cn: 在芝加哥我拍摄了很多地标照片，诸如水塔和湖滨道，回家后我在暗房里把照片冲冼出来（摄影是我的另一项爱好）。

sentences.en: As we walked out to the South Lawn to get on the helicopter, with Chelsea between Hillary and me and Buddy walking beside me, photographers took pictures that revealed the pain I had caused.
sentences.cn: 我们朝停直升机的南草坪走去，切尔西走在我和希拉里中间，家里的宠物犬巴迪在我旁边。 摄影师们拍下的照片把我带给亲人的痛苦暴露无疑。

sentences.en: Finally, while in the MRI machine, participants looked at a photograph of their dumper while the scientists took pictures of their brain activity.
sentences.cn: 最后，与MRI机器接通后，当他们看着抛弃子的恋人的照片时，科学家为他们的大脑活动拍了照片。

sentences.en: She bought an English dictionary for me.
sentences.cn: 她给我买了一本英语词典。

sentences.en: I bought the car from the store for cash.
sentences.cn: 我用现金从这家商店买下这辆汽车。

sentences.en: We stood in with him who bought us the meals.
sentences.cn: 他为我们买回了吃的，大家分摊了那笔钱。

phrases.cn: 产品返销；补偿交易；补进

sentences.en: The earrings were a gift from my aunt.
sentences.cn: 这副耳环是我姑姑送给我的礼物。

sentences.en: The clock was given as a retirement gift when he left the police.
sentences.cn: 这个钟表是他退休离开警局时收到的礼物。

sentences.en: expensive wedding gifts
sentences.cn: 昂贵的结婚礼物

phrases.cn: 爱上…（fall in love with的过去式）

sentences.en: I’ll get off at the next stop.
sentences.cn: 我将在下一站下车。

sentences.en: Everyone got off the train at Winnipeg.
sentences.cn: 所有的人都在温尼伯下火车。

sentences.en: 1Kathmandu, Nepal: A Nepalese man whose head has been painted with the communist hammer and sickle symbol joins a procession to mark International Labour Day Photograph: PRAKASH MATHEMA/AFP
sentences.cn: 1/13泊尔加德满都（Kathmandu Nepal）：为庆祝“五一”国际劳动节，游行队伍中一名尼泊尔男子在头上用颜料涂上象征着共产主义的锤子和镰刀。

sentences.en: If I had that much money, I'd buy another mule.
sentences.cn: 要是我有那么多钱，我早就另买一头骡子了。

sentences.en: Walking or riding on a mule, a tourist can look into the monasteries one by one.
sentences.cn: 如果你步行或骑着骡子进山观光，沿途便呈现出一座又一座修道院。

sentences.en: First, through a pine forest, spurning the mule trail and the shortcuts, and sampling the blueberries; then through an alluvial cone, wasting precious energy.
sentences.cn: 首先，穿过一片松树林，没在意骡子走过的足迹和捷径，品尝着蓝莓；然后穿过冲击堆，浪费了宝贵的精力。

sentences.en: Ahmed then took me for a drive outside Turpan to a small Uyghur village at the foot of a mountain where I could see their style of housing, farming, etc.
sentences.cn: 然后，艾哈迈德载我去吐鲁番郊外的、山脚下的一个维族小村庄，在那我可以看到他们的建筑风格，以及农事等等。

sentences.en: By the time she was eight, she could read Greek and Latin.
sentences.cn: 她八岁时就会读希腊文和拉丁文了。

sentences.en: In those days you could buy a box of cigars for a dollar.
sentences.cn: 那时候，一美元能买一盒雪茄烟。

sentences.en: Could you hear what I was saying?
sentences.cn: 你能听到我说的话吗？

sentences.en: I didn’t have a boyfriend till I was 17.
sentences.cn: 我直到17岁才有男朋友。

sentences.en: The shop’s open till nine o’clock on Fridays.
sentences.cn: 这家商店周五营业到9点。

sentences.en: a sandy beach
sentences.cn: 沙滩

sentences.en: surfers on the beach
sentences.cn: 沙滩上的冲浪者

phrases.cn: adj. 在海滩上；失业的；潦倒的；退休的

sentences.en: a shopping basket
sentences.cn: 购物篮

sentences.en: a basket full of vegetables
sentences.cn: 装满蔬菜的篮子

sentences.en: Could someone take the part of Romeo, please?
sentences.cn: 能请谁来扮演罗密欧吗？

sentences.en: Katharine’s playing the part of Mary in the school play.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳在学校的话剧中扮演玛丽一角。

sentences.en: She folded up her letter, licking the envelope flap with relish.
sentences.cn: 她把信折起来，享受地舔着信封盖。

sentences.en: He was about to offer an explanation, but she was beginning to laugh.
sentences.cn: 他刚要加以解释，她就开始笑起来了。

sentences.en: I just couldn't laugh at his jokes the way I used to.
sentences.cn: 我就是不能像以前那样笑他讲的笑话。

sentences.en: "We could do with some help from our friends," he laughed.
sentences.cn: “如果我们朋友来帮助就好了，”他笑着说道。

sentences.en: The next morning, each one went down to get breakfast in the dining hall of their respective dorms.
sentences.cn: 第二天早上，男女双方径直回到自己的宿舍餐厅吃早饭。

sentences.en: To test this idea, the researchers parked themselves at the door of the Stanford dining hall and handed out questionnaires about dating to diners, some as they entered and others as they left.
sentences.cn: 为了检验这个假设，研究者在斯坦福大学食堂门口发放关于约会和吃饭的问卷，一些在进去的时候填，另一些被试在出来的时候填写。

sentences.en: I walked across the grass.
sentences.cn: 我走在草地上。

sentences.en: Keep off the grass.
sentences.cn: 请勿践踏草地。

sentences.en: I go to the gym as often as I can.
sentences.cn: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

sentences.en: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.cn: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.en: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.cn: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

sentences.en: But the traffic worries me! I’m not sure about cycling in such heavy traffic.
sentences.cn: 但是交通使我担心！ 在这么拥挤的车辆中骑自行车我不太肯定。

phrases.cn: 温度循环；温度周期变化

sentences.en: If it rains, I won’t go cycling.
sentences.cn: 如果下雨，我就不去骑车了。

sentences.en: What do you do on Monday? I go cycling.
sentences.cn: 你星期一做什么？ 我去骑自行车。

sentences.en: B: If I go cycling, I'll be tired by the evening.
sentences.cn: 如果我去骑车的话，晚上我肯定会很累了。

sentences.en: A: I can't believe you're going to teach me how to ice-skate!
sentences.cn: 没想到会是你教我滑冰！

sentences.en: I like playing basketball and  badminton.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢的篮球和羽毛球。

sentences.en: My friend and I take part in sports like tennis,badminton and swimming.
sentences.cn: 我和我的朋友参加体育运动如打网球,羽毛球和游泳.

sentences.en: When the shuttlecock was hit to and fro with a racket across a net, thegame was badminton.
sentences.cn: 双方用球拍拍打毽子使它来来往往的越过网前，这种游戏就是羽毛球。

sentences.en: I lay on my back and looked up at the stars.
sentences.cn: 我仰卧着看天上的星星。

sentences.en: The sky was filled with stars.
sentences.cn: 满天繁星。

sentences.en: The stars were shining .
sentences.cn: 群星闪烁。

sentences.en: The test was easy.
sentences.cn: 考试很容易。

sentences.en: Finishing the task will not be easy.
sentences.cn: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.en: There must be an easier way to do that.
sentences.cn: 一定有更容易的方法去做那件事。

phrases.cn: 如此轻而易举；就这么简单

sentences.en: I looked your address up in the personnel file.
sentences.cn: 我从人事档案里查到了你的地址。

sentences.en: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.cn: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.en: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.cn: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.en: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.cn: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

phrases.cn: 以不同方式；用不同的方法；通过不同的方式

sentences.en: games for active youngsters
sentences.cn: 活跃好动的年轻人玩的游戏

sentences.en: She’s over 80, but is still very active.
sentences.cn: 她80多岁了，但仍旧很活跃。

phrases.cn: 积极的作用；能动部分，主动部分

sentences.en: I'll race you to the bus stop.
sentences.cn: 我要和你赛一赛，看谁先跑到汽车站。

sentences.en: Her coach encouraged her throughout the marathon race to keep on running.
sentences.cn: 她的教练在马拉松赛全程鼓励她继续不断奔跑。

phrases.cn: 在比赛中；有成功的可能

sentences.en: Nothing ever happens in this town.
sentences.cn: 这镇上从来都不会发生什么特别的事。

sentences.en: There’s nothing in this box.
sentences.cn: 这盒子里什么也没有。

sentences.en: There was nothing else the doctors could do.
sentences.cn: 医生们没有别的办法了。

sentences.en: It’s an interesting thought.
sentences.cn: 这想法很有趣。

sentences.en: The thought that I might not have a job next year is a bit troubling.
sentences.cn: 想到明年可能失业我有点心烦。

sentences.en: He felt the press of modern life.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到现代生活的压力。

sentences.en: I felt lonesome in the strange land.
sentences.cn: 在那陌生的地方我觉得寂寞。

sentences.en: She felt colour flame up in her cheeks.
sentences.cn: 她感到脸上火辣辣地红了起来。

sentences.en: Imagine you’re a cheetah and you see two juicy gazelles grazing in the grass.
sentences.cn: 想像你是一个猎豹, 你看见两只味道鲜美的瞪羚正在草地上吃草.

sentences.en: Police and wildlife experts were called to the scene, and the injured cheetah was later caught by a pest control worker.
sentences.cn: 警察和动物救护专家都被召集到了现场，这头受伤的猎豹后来被一名有害物控制人员抓获。

sentences.en: accidents caused by trips or falls
sentences.cn: 由绊倒或摔倒引起的事故

phrases.cn: 公务旅行，出差；商务旅行
往返旅行；环程旅行；[牌]大团圆

sentences.en: And yet, when they woke Jesus, he said to them, “Why are you afraid?
sentences.cn: 可是，他们叫醒主耶稣时，主耶稣对他们说：“你们这小信的人哪！

sentences.en: To my surprise, I woke up in my bed the next morning.
sentences.cn: 令我惊讶的是，第二天早上我醒来时发现在我的床上。

sentences.en: Have you ever woke up and forgot how to speak English?
sentences.cn: 你有过一觉醒来忘记怎么说英语的经历吗？

phrases.cn: 醒来，起床；开始警觉；开始了解真相
紧紧跟随；随着…而来；作为…的结果；仿效

sentences.en: I had lots of dreams last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我做了很多梦。

phrases.cn: 毫不费力地；轻而易举地；完美地

sentences.en: She was looking straight at me.
sentences.cn: 她直直地看着我。

sentences.en: Terry was so tired he couldn’t walk straight.
sentences.cn: 特里累得路都走不直了。

sentences.en: He was sitting with his legs stretched straight out in front of him.
sentences.cn: 他坐着，两条腿向前伸得直直的。

phrases.cn: 直率地；真实地；（酒）不加冰块的

sentences.en: He had a knife in his right hand.
sentences.cn: 他右手拿着一把刀。

sentences.en: a scar on the right side of her face
sentences.cn: 她右颊上的疤痕

sentences.en: ‘What’s your name?’ she asked.
sentences.cn: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.en: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
sentences.cn: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.en: That kid’s always asking awkward questions .
sentences.cn: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.en: ‘Report back to me in an hour, sergeant.’ ‘Yes, sir.’
sentences.cn: “一小时后向我报告，中士。”“是，长官。”

sentences.en: Can I help you, sir?
sentences.cn: 我能为您效劳吗，先生？

sentences.en: Sir! You dropped your wallet.
sentences.cn: 先生！ 您的钱包掉了。

phrases.cn: 尊敬的先生或女士（信笺的开头语）

sentences.en: That’s an interesting question.
sentences.cn: 那是一个有趣的问题。

sentences.en: a really interesting TV programme
sentences.cn: 十分有趣的电视节目

sentences.en: Did you meet any interesting people?
sentences.cn: 你见过什么有意思的人吗？

sentences.en: Her beauty is of the Italian type.
sentences.cn: 她的美是意大利型的。

sentences.en: The game terminated in a victory for Italian team.
sentences.cn: 比赛以意大利队获胜告终。

sentences.en: How could they be Italian?
sentences.cn: 他们怎么会是意大利人呢？

sentences.en: He took her out for a five-course dinner in a fancy restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他带她到一家豪华餐厅吃了一顿有五道菜的晚餐。

sentences.en: The company runs a chain of restaurants.
sentences.cn: 公司经营连锁饭店。

sentences.en: A new restaurant has just opened across the road.
sentences.cn: 马路对面刚开了一家新饭馆。

sentences.en: ...the last piece of pizza.
sentences.cn: …最后一块比萨饼。

sentences.en: We moved to Center Street when I was young.
sentences.cn: 在我小时候，我们搬到了中心大街。

sentences.en: She lives just a few streets away.
sentences.cn: 她的住处就在几条街外。

sentences.en: I walked on further down the street .
sentences.cn: 我继续沿着马路走。

phrases.cn: adj. 在街上；在交易所打烊后进行的；在户外

sentences.en: She got loads of presents.
sentences.cn: 她收到了许多礼物。

sentences.en: What did you get for Christmas?
sentences.cn: 你圣诞节收到了什么礼物？

sentences.en: We get a lot of junk mail.
sentences.cn: 我们收到许多垃圾邮件。

phrases.cn: 到达那里；取得成功，实现目标

sentences.en: With GPS, they also now know where you are whenever you have your phone.
sentences.cn: 利用全球定位系统，只要你带着电话，他们就知道你在哪里。

sentences.en: Used in combination with GPS, an accelerometer, a compass and the gyroscope can be used for in indoor navigation with floor accuracy.
sentences.cn: 与全球定位系统、加速度计、陀螺仪和指南针结合使用，可用于具有地面精度的室内导航。

sentences.en: There are already USB GPS devices for tracking where you’ve been but here’s another device that will instead keep track of what the temperature was, if for some reason you need to know.
sentences.cn: 已经有USB全球定位系统设备以追踪你的位置所在。 但是，如果你因某个原因需要知道温度的话,还有一个设备可以代替来追踪记录温度。

phrases.cn: 分发，发出；公布，发表；用尽，精疲力竭

sentences.en: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.cn: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.en: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.cn: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.en: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

phrases.cn: 主要特征；主要特点；主景；功能特点

sentences.en: Are those men following us?
sentences.cn: 那些人在跟着我们吗？

sentences.en: The patrol car followed the BMW for a few miles and then lost it.
sentences.cn: 巡逻车跟了那辆宝马几英里，后来就跟丢了。

sentences.en: Tom’s already gone out to Rome and his wife and children will follow shortly.
sentences.cn: 汤姆已经去罗马了，他的妻儿很快就会跟着去。

phrases.cn: 跟踪；坚持完成；继续做某事

sentences.en: He started to explain, but he didn’t get far (= he did not succeed in saying very much ) before Mary interrupted him.
sentences.cn: 他开始解释起来，但没说几句就被玛丽打断了。

sentences.en: Many people felt that the new law did not go far enough (= did not have a big enough effect, so that more needed to be done ) .
sentences.cn: 许多人认为新的法律力度不够。

sentences.en: I’ll tell you all about it when I get back.
sentences.cn: 我回来再告诉你这一切。

sentences.en: Sheppard was telling the truth .
sentences.cn: 谢泼德说的是实话。
